joke: [me narrating a documentary about narrators] "I can't hear what they're saying cuz I'm talking"
translation: [我在讲述关于叙述者的纪录片] “我听不清他们在说什么，因为我在说话。”

joke: Telling my daughter garlic is good for you. Good immune system and keeps pests away.Ticks, mosquitos, vampires... men.
translation: 告诉我的女儿大蒜对你有好处。增强免疫系统，还能驱赶讨厌的东西。苍蝇、蚊子、吸血鬼……还有男人。

joke: I've been going through a really rough period at work this week It's my own fault for swapping my tampax for sand paper.
translation: 这周我在工作上遇到了很大的麻烦。都怪我自己，把卫生巾换成了砂纸。

joke: If I could have dinner with anyone, dead or alive... ...I would choose alive. -B.J. Novak-
translation: 如果我能和任何人共进晚餐，无论是死是活……我选择和活人共餐。——B.J.诺瓦克

joke: Did you hear about the guy who blew his entire lottery winnings on a limousine? He had nothing left to chauffeur it.
translation: 你听说没有，那个人中了彩票后把所有的钱都用来买了一辆豪华轿车，结果连开轿车的钱都没有了。

joke: What do you do if a bird shits on your car? Don't ask her out again.
translation: 如果你的车被鸟粪弄脏了，你应该怎么做？下次不要约她了。

joke: Telling my daugthers date that "she has lice and its very contagious the closer you get to her." *Correct way to parent.
translation: 告诉女儿的男朋友说：“她有头虱，你离她越近就越容易传染。” *这就是正确的育儿方式。

joke: What's the difference between an illegal Mexican and an autonomous robot...? Nothing... they were both made to steal American jobs.
translation: 非法墨西哥人和自主机器人有什么区别吗……没有区别……它们都是用来偷美国工作的。

joke: You ever notice that the most dangerous thing about marijuana is getting caught with it?
translation: 你有没有注意到，大麻最危险的事情其实是被抓住拥有它？

joke: My wife is in a bad mood. I think her boyfriend forgot their anniversary. Way to go, dude. Now we all suffer...
translation: 我的妻子心情不好。我想她是她男朋友忘了纪念日。干得好，伙计。现在我们全都得受罪……

joke: My speech today will be like a mini-skirt. Long enough to cover the essentials but short enough to hold your attention!
translation: 我今天的演讲就像迷你裙，长到能覆盖必需的内容，短到能抓住你的注意力！

joke: Thanksgiving joke What does Miley Cyrus eat for Thanksgiving? Twerky! Just kidding... Drugs. She eats drugs. -Adam Zopf @adamzopf
translation: 感恩节笑话米勒·库斯在感恩节吃什么呢？是Twerky！开个玩笑……毒品。她吃毒品。-亚当·佐普夫 @adamzopf

joke: Why do you never see elephants hiding in trees? 'Cause they are freaking good at it
translation: 为什么你从不会看到大象躲在树上？因为他们这招真的超级溜！

joke: "That guy is such a douche-bag! Is he single? Maybe I can fix him!"  women
translation: 那个家伙真是个混账！他单身吗？ maybe 我能帮他改改！（女性视角）

joke: My son just got a tattoo of a heart, a spade, a club, and a diamond, all without my permission. I guess I'll deal with him later.
translation: 我的儿子未经我的允许纹了一个心、一个黑桃、一个梅花和一个方片，我一会儿再和他算账。Note: In this translation, "黑桃" (hēitāo) refers to "spade," "梅花" (méihua) refers to "club," and "方片" (fāngpiàn) refers to "diamond," which are the Chinese terms for the suits in a deck of cards.

joke: What's the difference between a painting and Jesus. You only require one nail to put up the painting.
translation: 画和耶稣有什么不同？挂画只需要一根钉子。

joke: Mom: "Do you want this?" Me: "No." Mom: "Ok I'll give it to your brother." Me: "No I want it."
translation: 妈妈：“你要不要？”  我：“不要。”  妈妈：“那我给你弟弟了。”  我：“不要，我要！”

joke: I am looking forward to 6pm Thanksgiving Day when Walmart opens its doors for its annual sale of trampled human corpses.
translation: 我期待着感恩节当天下午6点，沃尔玛一开门就能看到踩踏致死的人群。

joke: Yttrium-barium-copper oxide walks into a bar The bartender tells him, "We don't serve superconductors here." He leaves without resistance.
translation: 钇钡铜氧（YBCO）走进了一家酒吧，酒吧老板告诉他：“我们这里不招待超导体。”然后他毫不抗拒地走了出去。

joke: Every night, I take all of the singles out of my wallet, spread them on the bed, and pretend I was pretty that day.
translation: 每天晚上，我都会把钱包里的零钱全部拿出来摊在床上，假装自己那天很漂亮。

joke: Before I destroy a wasp's nest I like to capture a single wasp and tell it my entire diabolical plan.
translation: 在摧毁一个马蜂窝之前，我喜欢先捉一只马蜂，然后把我的全部恶毒计划告诉它。

joke: INTERVIEWER: Why do you want to work here? ME: *crumbs tumbling from my mouth* Oh, I don't. I was just walking by and saw you had donuts.
translation: 面试官：你为什么想在这里工作？我：（嘴里 crumbs 掉落）哦，我不是。我只是路过这里，看到你们有甜甜圈。

joke: Coming on valentines day. Fifty shades of grey. There won't be a dry seat in the cinema.
translation: 情人节上映。《五十度灰》。电影院里没有干座。

joke: Did you hear about the midget psychic who escaped from prison? He's a small medium at large.
translation: 你听说没，那个矮个子灵媒从监狱逃出来了？他是个小号通灵者（逃犯）。

joke: Someone didnt click the button in /r/thebutton Yeah... Thats a good joke , he impossible!
translation: 有人没有点击/r/thebutton 这个按钮？哈哈，这真是个好笑的梗，他不可能会点击那个按钮！

joke: What's the difference between a car tyre, and 365 condoms? One's a Goodyear, an the other's a great year.
translation: 轮胎和365个避孕套有什么区别？一个是Goodyear，另一个是一整年的好时光（双关，意为一年365个避孕套）。

joke: I've struggled for years to be above the influence... But I've never been able to get that high
translation: 我努力了好几年才摆脱了那种影响……但我也从来没有能达到那种他们希望我避免的“high”。

joke: With Facebook, you can stay in touch with people you would otherwise never talk to, but that's only one of the many awful things about it
translation: 通过 Facebook，你可以和根本不会交流的人保持联系，但这仅仅是它很多糟糕之处中的一种。

joke: What's the difference between a blonde and a washer? When you dump your load in a washer, it doesn't follow you around for a week.
translation: 什么是金发女郎和洗衣机之间的区别？当你把一-load 衣物放进洗衣机里，它不会跟着你整整一周。

joke: Have you ever heard of the movie "Constipation"? No? Most likely because it never came out.
translation: 你听说过电影《便秘》吗？没有吧？很可能就是因为这部电影根本就没有上映。

joke: I saw a French rifle on eBay today It's never been fired but I heard it was dropped once.
translation: 我在 eBay 上看到一把法式步枪。它 never 被发射过，但我听说它曾经掉过一次。

joke: Bill Clinton must be the luckiest man in the world. All of the sex he has, with Hillary, you know it's hate sex.
translation: 比尔·克林顿一定是世界上最幸运的男人。他和希拉里的所有性经历，都是出于仇恨，而不是爱。

joke: yeah girl.. shake that thing where poop comes out of. it really turns me on when your poop factory shakes faster than usual
translation: 嗯，姑娘……让你的“排泄工厂”摇晃一下，真的让我很兴奋，尤其是它比平时摇晃得更快的时候。

joke: "I can't stand when people say they hate both of the presidential candidates." --Stephen Hawking
translation: "我不能忍受有人both候选人我都恨这种说法。" ——斯蒂芬·霍金

joke: I was drinking at the bar, so I took a bus home. That may not be a big deal to you, but I've never driven a bus before!
translation: 我在酒吧喝酒，所以坐公交车回家了。这对你可能不算什么，但我要告诉你，我以前从来没有开过公交车！

joke: Donald Trump will ban the sale of shredded cheese He wants to make America grate again
translation: 唐纳德·特朗普要禁止出售切达奶酪了，他想让美国再次变得粗糙起来。

joke: Things have really turned around for me since I re-named my penis and testicles "JD Power and Associates".
translation: 自从我把自己的阴茎和睾丸改名为“JD 力量与咨询公司”之后，我的生活真的好转了很多。

joke: My cat just walked by me carrying a toy mouse I don't remember buying her. Women be shoppin!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
translation: 我的猫刚刚拿着一只玩具老鼠从我身边走过，而这只老鼠是我根本没给她买的。女人真是买买买!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

joke: Sometimes you check the amount of subscribed people. When you do this, there are 4,111,093,0003.666 "humorists". 2/3rds of a person? Really?
translation: 有时候你会检查订阅者数量。当你这么做的时候，你会发现有4,111,093,0003.666个“幽默家”。三分之二个人？真的吗？

joke: I don't believe in Bigfoot; because he never believed in me. I'd scan the crowd at my ballet recitals, and always see that one empty seat.
translation: 我不相信有大脚怪，因为大脚怪从不相信我。我曾在芭蕾舞演出时环视过观众席，总能看到一个空位，就像大脚怪坐在那里观看我的演出却从不开腔支持我。

joke: What did the porn actress say when she opened the door? Make sure to come upstairs.
translation: 色情演员在开门后说了什么？上来 upstairs。

joke: I don't judge people based on color, race, religion, sexuality, or gender...I base it on whether or not they're an asshole.
translation: 我不会因为肤色、种族、宗教、性取向或性别来评判人……我只会看他们是不是混账。

joke: Not to get too technical, but chemistry says alcohol IS a solution. So I win.
translation: 不开玩笑地说，化学上酒精确实是一种溶液。所以我就赢了。

joke: I often think if I'd taken a different path in life, I could be lying on a slightly more comfortable sofa right now.
translation: 我常常想，如果当初我选择了一条不同的路，我现在可能正躺在一张稍微舒服一点的沙发上。

joke: What did the hillbilly say to his sister after she asked him to have sex with her? If you incest.
translation: 这个hillbilly在被他妹妹要求发生性关系后说了什么？如果你愿意的话（incest发音类似insist）。

joke: "You know what, we need a huge spoon to take care of this" -Guy who invented shovels
translation: “你知道吗，我们需要一个巨大的汤匙来解决这个问题。”——那个发明铲子的人

joke: How to keep the flies off the bride at an Italian wedding Keep a bucket of shit next to her
translation: 如何在意大利婚礼上让苍蝇远离新娘？就在她旁边放一个装满粪便的桶。

joke: 7% of all hearing loss is a result of sitting in a restaurant next to a table full of women who just received dessert.
translation: 所有听力损失中有7%是由于坐在餐馆里，隔壁桌是一群刚吃完甜点的女性所致。

joke: What do people from the 1930's and /r/news jokes have in common? They're both old.
translation: 1930年代的人和/r/news里的笑话有什么共同点？他们都很老了。

joke: ME: I fell off a 50 ft tall ladder once GIRL: holy cow how did you survive ME: I fell off the bottom rung
translation: 我曾经从一个50英尺高的梯子上摔下来。女孩：天哪，你怎么样 survive 的？我：因为我摔在了最下面的一级台阶上。

joke: What do you call a blind dinosaur? A do-think-he-saurus :) !! Lol What do you call a blind dinosaurs dog? A do-you-think-he-saurus-rex
translation: 什么叫做盲眼的恐龙？一个do-think-he-saurus :) !! 欢乐一下什么是盲眼恐龙的狗？一个do-you-think-he-saurus-rex

joke: This may be not be a mainstream opinion, but I don't believe you should cut down a Christmas tree unless you intend on eating it.
translation: 这可能不是主流观点，但我的确认为，如果你不打算吃它，就不应该砍倒圣诞树。

joke: Jenna Jameson to Oprah, "There's a little bit of Jenna Jameson in everyone." I'm pretty sure she got that backwards.
translation: 珍娜·詹姆斯蒙对奥普拉说：“每个人身上都有一点珍娜·詹姆斯蒙。”我确定她是弄反了。

joke: I have a degree in men's studies. It's called "world history". #TRUMP 2016! YOU CAN'T STUMP THE TRUMP!
translation: 我有一个性别研究学位，叫作“世界历史”。#特朗普2016！YOU CAN'T STUMP THE TRUMP！

joke: Why don't most fans like the first 39 episodes of DBZ? Its pretty gay, just Saiyan.
translation: 为什么大多数粉丝不喜欢《龙珠Z》的前39集？因为它真的很“赛亚gay”， basically just关于赛亚人。

joke: This doctor once told me eating a bagel was like eating 5 slices of bread and I was like ok, cool, I like bread
translation: 这位医生曾经告诉我，吃一个甜甜圈就相当于吃了5片面包，我当时就说好的， cool，我喜欢面包。

joke: What do you call a three-humped camel? Pregnant (Told to me by one of the kids at work)
translation: 什么样的骆驼是怀孕的？三峰驼（这个笑话的一个孩子同事告诉我的）

joke: What defies the law of gravity? Women. They heavier they are, the easier they are to pick up.
translation: 违背 gravity 法则的是女性。越重的女性，越容易抱起来。

joke: Everything has to be related in a woman: if the mouth shuts, the legs open.
translation: 在女人身上，一切都有关联：如果嘴闭上了，腿就开了。

joke: "I'm so pissed I could punch a ba-" "A what?" Big Baby from Toy Story 3 hovers over me, sawed-off shotgun in hand. "A bagel. I HATE carbs."
translation: 我气得差一点能一拳打掉一个——“什么？”《玩具总动员3》里的大宝宝手持来福枪悬在我的头上。“一个袋el。我讨厌碳水化合物。”

joke: What's the difference Donald Trump and my Vagina? One's a Cunt and the other has nice hair.
translation: 特朗普和我的阴道有什么区别？一个是“cunt”，另一个有不错的毛发。

joke: My doctor had to put me on a new medication that's supposed to help lower the amount of karate in my blood
translation: 我的医生给我开了一种新药，说是能帮助降低我血液里的“ karate”水平。

joke: [uses the restroom] Wife: make sure to put the toilet seat down Me: okay Me: [to toilet seat] you're worthless and nobody likes you
translation: [上厕所] 妻子：把马桶盖盖上。 我：好的。 我：（对马桶盖说）你没用，没人喜欢你。

joke: Q: What's the difference between a blonde and a supermarket trolley? A: The supermarket trolley has a mind of its own.
translation: Q: 有什么区别吗？一个金发女郎和一个超市手推车？A: 超市手推车有自己的想法。

joke: You know... When someone says to you "Jesus loves you." It's always comforting. Unless you are in a Mexican jail.
translation: 你知道吗……当有人对你说“耶稣爱你。”这通常总是让人感到安慰的。除非你是在墨西哥监狱里。

joke: When I hear "This call is being monitored for quality assurance" I think "Cool, let's see how bad this person wants their job."
translation: 当我听到“此通话正在被监控以确保质量”时，我想，“酷，让我们看看这个人有多想保住这份工作。”

joke: You know what the definition of "competitive" is? Finishing first *and* third in a circlejerk.
translation: 你知道什么是“富有竞争力”吗？就是在一次圈地赛（所有人都是互相竞争的封闭圈子中的比赛）中，同时获得第一和第三名。

joke: How do you know if your wine was made in the 90's? It smells like teen spirit.
translation: 你怎么知道你的葡萄酒是90年代酿造的？闻起来就像Teen Spirit（青少年精神）。

joke: [car wreck] [hand reaches out] "Take my hand. I'm Chad Kroeger from the popular band Nickelback." [I let the flames slowly bake me alive]
translation: [车毁人亡] [手伸出来] "给我手。我是流行乐队 Nickelback 的 Chad Kroeger。" [让我慢慢地在火焰中烤熟吧]

joke: Just waiting for Steve Harvey to come out and say it's actually Clinton any second now
translation: JUST 等着 Steve Harvey 出来宣布其实是克林顿呢。

joke: Chicken Why did the chicken cross the road? Why? To go to the gay guys house Knock knock Who's there? The chicken
translation: 鸡 为什么鸡要过马路？ 为什么？ 去Gay guy家玩儿了 Knock knock 你是谁？ 鸡鸡

joke: Teacher: Why do we put a hyphen in a bird-cage?  Pupil: For a parrot to perch on miss.
translation: 老师：我们在鸟笼里加个连字符有什么用？学生：让鹦鹉可以站在miss上面。

joke: I visited Amsterdam this summer, and decided to have sex with a prostitute. It was an overall positive experience. Sadly, it was an HIV positive experience.
translation: 今年夏天我去阿姆斯特丹，决定和一个妓女发生了性关系。总体来说是一次积极的经历。可惜的是，这还是一次艾滋病阳性经历。

joke: Yup. If pasta & antipasta ever touch, they annihilate. For your safety, that's why restaurants never serve them together.
translation: 嗯。如果面食和开胃面不小心碰到一起，它们就会互相湮灭。为了您的安全，这就是为什么餐馆从不将它们放在一起的原因。

joke: When my wife takes a nap, it's "desperately needed rest." When I do, it's "lazy chauvinist party-time."
translation: 当我的妻子打盹时，那是“极度需要的休息”。当我打盹时，那是“懒惰的男性狂欢时间”。

joke: lookin for a quick and easy way to beef up that scrawny bod and really turn some heads at the beach? float dead in a lake
translation: 在海滩上想要迅速轻松地让瘦弱的身材变得健硕，还能吸引眼球吗？那就去湖里溺死吧。

joke: TIL A ref can show a player the red card for a loud fart ... even if it isn't Messi.
translation: 你知道吗？裁判可以因为一声响亮的放屁就给球员出示红牌……即便这个人不是梅西。

joke: What did the wise man say to the fat guy? You should probably go on a diet.
translation: 智者对那个胖家伙说了什么？你应该去节食。

joke: Who is better? The 3rd wave feminist or the pencil? The pencil is better. It has a point.
translation: 谁更好？第三波女权主义者还是铅笔？铅笔更好。它有尖头。

joke: Guys, I think I found the Cure to Aids! It requires having a Magic Johnson.
translation: guys，我觉得我找到了治疗艾滋病的方法！就是和一个“魔术师”约翰逊在一起。

joke: Why do you call a Mexican midget a paragraph? ...because he's too short to be called an essay.
translation: 为什么你叫一个墨西哥矮个子为段落？……因为他太矮了，不能被称为文章。

joke: This morning I had a swollen testicle. "I'd have simply preferred toast," I told my wife.
translation: 今天早上我睾丸肿了，我对妻子说：“我宁愿吃烤面包。”

joke: "What's that?" A divorce jar. Every time we fight you put a dollar in and I'm a little bit closer to freedom. *puts in dollar* "WTH!?!"
translation: “那是什么？”离婚基金。每次我们吵架你投一美元，我就离自由近一点了。*投进一美元*“什么鬼！？”

joke: If you have a parrot and you don't teach it to say,"Help, they've turned me into a parrot." you are wasting everybody's time.
translation: 如果你有一只鹦鹉，却不教它說「救命，他們把我變成了隻鹦鹉」，那你就浪费大家的时间了。

joke: My 8 y/o memorized my 12 character password that has upper and lowercase letters, numbers and symbols but can't remember to flush the toilet
translation: 我的8岁孩子记住了我的12位复杂密码，包含大小写字母、数字和符号，但却忘了冲马桶。

joke: Me: waiter, do you have frog legs? Waiter: of course monsieur Me: good, hop over there and get me a beer
translation: 顾客：服务员，你们有蛙腿吗？服务员：当然有了先生。顾客：好的，那你跳过来给我拿瓶啤酒。

joke: It's comforting to know that the US government works the same way as a college student when it comes to deadlines... They both wait until the last minute, then get an extension.
translation: 知道吗？美国政府在截止日期方面和大学生一模一样……他们都等到最后一分钟，然后申请延期，这一点让人感到很安慰。

joke: What did the man with The World's Largest Penis say when he had to have his legs amputated "Don't worry, I still have my third one."
translation: 那个被截肢的男人原来拥有世界上最大的阴茎，当他不得不进行双腿截肢手术时，他淡定地说：“别担心，我还有我的第三根呢。”

joke: What's the worse thing to do to a blind person? Leave a plunger in the toilet
translation: 盲人最糟糕的事情是什么？把一个通气管留在马桶里。

joke: When I was interviewed for a job in the chemistry department, they asked me if I had lab experience. I said I was more of a cat person.
translation: 当我被化学系面试的时候，他们问我有没有实验室经验。我说我更喜欢猫。

joke: Two skeptics walk into a bar.. I'd tell you what happens next but noone knows
translation: 两个怀疑论者走进了酒吧……我想告诉你接下来发生了什么，但没人知道。

joke: Everytime you pull the trigger a bullet loses its job...HAHAHAHA! Because it gets FIRED. HAHAHA! *I'm in tears*
translation: 每次你扣动扳机，一颗子弹就会失业……哈哈哈！因为它被FIRED了。哈哈哈！*笑到泪流*

joke: It would be great to be born on Earth and die on Mars. Preferably not on the point of impact.
translation: 可以在地球上出生，在火星上死去那该多好。最好别死在着陆撞击的那一刻。

joke: Descartes walks into the bar. The bartender asks him, "will you have your usual tonight?" Rene replies "I think not" and he disappears.
translation: 笛卡尔走进酒吧，调酒师问他：“你今晚要像往常一样来一杯吗？”笛卡尔回答说：“我想不会了,”然后他就消失了。

joke: Anyone want to hear my Human Centipede joke? Nah, I won't tell you it. It sucks ass.
translation: 有人想听我讲的人肉蜈蚣虫笑话吗？算了，我不说了，特别烂。

joke: My dog can predict when an earthquake is going to happen. But television doorbell versus actual doorbell baffles him every time.
translation: 我的狗能预测地震什么时候发生。但是电视门铃和真正的门铃每次都会让他困惑。

joke: My favorite knock knock joke. I need someone to start it ... Someone start the knock knock joke ...
translation: 我最喜欢的“ Knock Knock ”笑话。需要有人开头……有人来开个“ Knock Knock ”笑话吧……

joke: My Parents asked me what i wanted for christmas... I said i want something to wear and something to play with. So they got me a pair of pants with the pockets cut out.
translation: 我的父母问我想要圣诞礼物是什么……我说我想得到一些可以穿的东西和可以玩的东西。于是他们给我买了一条没有口袋的裤子。

joke: With 10K characters, I can finally get into great detail about how I'm not allowed at the company family picnic any more!
translation: 用10K字符，我终于可以详细描述一下为什么我不能再参加公司的家庭野餐了！

joke: [at my funeral] So young, how did he die? He ran into oncoming traffic after walking past a group of adults saying the word "bae"
translation: 在我葬礼上：这么年轻，他是怎么死的？他在一群大人说“bae”的时候，穿过马路，然后撞上了对向而来的车辆。

joke: Stealing my little brother's (fellow Redditor) original joke, hope he sees it and is pissed. What do you get when you cross a pig and a Christmas tree...? A Porky-Pine
translation: 偷了我弟弟（另一位 redditor）的原版笑话，希望他看到了会生气。当你把猪和圣诞树交叉之后会得到什么……一个 Porky-Pine。

joke: I lost my virginity to a retarded girl last night. I wanted it to be special
translation: 我很失望，昨晚我失去处女膜是一个智障女孩。我本希望那是一个特别的时刻。

joke: What is the biggest compliment you can pay at a gay bar? Pushing in somebody's stool.
translation: 你能在同性酒吧里给someone的最大 compliment是什么？就是帮他推凳子。

joke: What's a pirate's favourite type of weaponry? It's ARRRtillery! bonus: A pirate's favourite melee weapon? A scimitARRR
translation: 什么是海盗最喜欢的武器类型？当然是ARRRtillery！额外的：海盗最喜欢的近战武器？是scimitARRR！

joke: Hey, who did you vote for?... I wrote in Michael J. Fox. I think he can really shake things up!
translation: 嘿，你投给谁了？……我投给了迈克尔·J·福克斯。我觉得他真的能搅动一番！

joke: I once had a crippiling masturbation addiction... ...now i have a sex addiction, could you say my addiction has gotten out of hand?
translation: 我曾经有一个令人痛苦的自慰成瘾……现在我有了一个性成瘾，你能说我的成瘾情况已经失控了吗？

joke: *Guy tries giving me his phone number* Me: Oh no thank you. I already have one
translation: *一个 guy 给我他的电话号码* 我说：不了，谢谢。我已经有一个了（暗示已经有女朋友了）。

joke: I'm glad it's the thought that counts because I spend all day thinking about the shit I should be doing.
translation: 我很高兴现在是看想法重要，因为我一整天都在想着我应该做的事情。

joke: A man balks in a war He is discharged for dereliction of duty and takes up drinking.
translation: 在一个战争中，一个士兵犹豫了，因此他因失职被开除，并因此开始了酗酒的生活。

joke: Yo mama so lazy she thinks a two-income  family is where yo daddy has two jobs.
translation: 你妈真懒，她觉得双收入家庭意味着你爸有两份工作。

joke: Breaking Bad is my favorite documentary about what it takes to be an entrepreneur while balancing family life.
translation: 《绝命毒师》是我最喜欢的关于如何在平衡家庭生活的同时成为企业家的纪录片。

joke: What did the gay guy say to his lover when they were going on vacation? "Hey, can you help me pack my shit?"
translation: 什么使得那个gay男同志在度假时会对他的伴侣说：“嘿，能帮我打包我的东西吗？”（这里的“shit”一词在中文中被替换成了“东西”，保留了双关的意思。）

joke: Coworker: Stop Me: collaborate and listen Coworker: Don't Me: you forget about me Coworker: Hey! Me: teacher, leave them kids alone
translation: 同事：Stop Me：一起合作，认真听讲同事：Don't Me：别忘了我同事：嘿！我：老师，别管那些孩子们了

joke: What's an extroverted accountant? One who looks at your shoes while he's talking to you instead of his  own.
translation: 什么样的 extraverted 会计师 ？一种就是跟你说话的时候看你的鞋而不是他自己的鞋。

joke: Dear President Obama, I've got a joke for you... I texted it to Angela Merkel. Did you... *get it*?
translation: 奥巴马先生，我给你讲个笑话……我本来是想发给默克尔女士的。您……*get it*？

joke: Sorry, but breaking up with you on facebook was the best way of letting all your friends know I'm available.
translation: 抱歉，但是通过 Facebook 和你分手是我通知所有朋友我available的最佳方式。

joke: I don't understand women. I also don't understand how a car works but I still drive it.
translation: 我不懂女人的心思。我也不懂汽车怎么发动，但我也一样开汽车。

joke: What are the 3 stages of sex after marriage? Tri-weekly Try Weekly and Try Weakly
translation: 婚姻之后性生活的三个阶段是什么？每三周一次的尝试、每周一次的尝试和无力的尝试。

joke: My girlfriend is great in bed... But I don't know how my best friend would know that.
translation: 我的女朋友床上功夫很强…… 但我不知道我的好朋友是怎么知道的。

joke: [Justice League HQ] SUPERMAN: Looks like Batman is hungry tonight MOTHMAN: [visibly sweating] I think I'll just fight daytime crimes
translation: [正义联盟总部] 超人：看来蝙蝠侠今天白天也有胃口了。 蝙蝠侠：（明显在出汗）我想我今天白天就去惩恶除奸吧。

joke: My favourite word is snigger It allows me to be sracist without speople sthinking I'm a sbad sperson
translation: 我最喜欢的词是“窃笑”（snigger）。这个词让我可以在不显得是个坏人的情况下进行微妙的种族冒犯（sracist）。

joke: How do you hide an elephant in a fridge? You remove his slippers and open the door . You put him inside. You close the door and take the slippers away.
translation: 你怎么把大象藏进冰箱里？首先，你把他的拖鞋拿走然后打开冰箱门。你把大象放进去，然后关上冰箱门，再把拖鞋拿走。

joke: Pete and repeat are in a boat Pete and repeat are brothers. Pete falls overboard, who's left?
translation: 佩特和重复在一条船上，佩特和重复是兄弟。佩特掉到水里去了，剩下谁？

joke: What did Arnold Schwarzenegger say to the gym manager when he was joining a new gym? I'll re-rack.
translation: 阿诺德·施瓦辛格加入新健身房时对健身房经理说了什么？——我来重新整理一下。

joke: Right now a group of women at a baby shower are simultaneously saying, "Awwww..." while some knocked up chick holds up a tiny pair of socks.
translation: 现在一群女人在婴儿茶会上同时发出 "啊～～…" 的声音，而某个怀孕的女人正拿着一双超小的袜子。

joke: Gentlemen test At least most tests have the decency to ask me my name, before they fuck me.
translation: 绅士测试 至少大多数测试还有 decency（体面） 在进行之前会问我的名字，而不会像某些事情一样直接“占用”我。

joke: I went in to hospital for an operation... I asked the anaesthetist if I could administer the needle myself, and he said: "Sure, knock yourself out".
translation: 我去医院做手术……我问麻醉师能不能自己给自己打麻药，他说：“当然，你自己昏过去吧。”

joke: A piece of shit walks into a bar It's my dad... My dad is a piece of shit.
translation: 一只屎壳郎走进了酒吧。是我的爸爸……我的爸爸就是一只屎壳郎。

joke: What is the last thing that tickle-me elmo gets before he leaves the factory? Two test tickles
translation: 这个Tickle-me Elmo在离开工厂之前最后会收到什么？是两个“提拉克”（test tickles 的谐音，意指睾丸，这里利用发音相似制造幽默）。

joke: What do you get when you cross a sheep stealer with royalty? Mutton Looter King
translation: 你把羊贼和 royalty 给一交叉，能得到什么？羊肉劫匪国王

joke: An Indian redditor gets an arranged marriage. He turns to his partner and says: "Thanks for the gold, kind stranger!"
translation: 一位Reddit上的印度网友经历了一次包办婚姻，他转向自己的伴侣说：“谢谢你的黄金，好心的陌生人！”

joke: What do you tell a woman with two black eyes? ..........Nothing you've already told her twice!
translation: what do you 说给一个眼睛乌青的女人？........... nothing, 你已经说了两次了！

joke: I'd kill for a microwave that plays Europe's "The Final Countdown" during the last 30 seconds.
translation: 我宁可要一个在最后30秒播放欧洲的《最终 countdown》的微波炉，也不愿意真的为此送命。

joke: Did you hear about the skeleton who didn't go to prom? He had no body to go with.
translation: 你听说了吗，那个没去参加舞会的骷髅？他没有身体可以赴约啊。

joke: What do you call it when a jugaloo sleeps with his girlfriend after a fight? Make up sex.
translation: 当一个爱哭鬼在吵架后和女朋友发生关系，你叫它什么？和好如初的性生活。

joke: Kids are like farts. You don't mind your own, but others peoples are just unbearable
translation: 孩子们就像放屁一样。你不会介意自己的放屁，但别人的放屁却无法忍受。

joke: Over the past year, my sexual fetishes have been slowly getting more perverse. But it wasn't until I spanked a statue that I realised I'd hit rock bottom.
translation: 在过去的这一年里，我的性癖好逐渐变得越来越变态。但直到我打了一尊雕像，我才意识到自己已经坠入了谷底。

joke: I milked the cow "We don't have a cow" the neighbors' cow then "Their cat?" Pretty sure it was a cow he was saying moo "Meow" Ah shoot
translation: 我给那头奶牛挤奶了“你们没有奶牛吗？”然后是邻居的牛，“是他们的猫吗？”我肯定他是在说那声音是“哞”，结果却是“喵”。“哎呀，中枪了。”

joke: Dear Shirtless Guy in his Profile Pic, You REALLY want to impress girls? Get a job & pose in front of your cubicle.
translation: 亲爱的胸肌男（指那些在个人资料里晒胸肌照片的人），你真的想吸引女生吗？那就去找份工作，在你的工位前拍张照吧。

joke: The IRA have been fighting for Irish reunification since the 70s. . . All they needed to do was vote for the Conservatives.
translation: 自20世纪70年代以来，爱尔兰共和军（IRA）一直在为爱尔兰统一而斗争……他们只需要支持保守党就可以了。

joke: How many Reddit admins does it take to change a lightbulb? None, they like to keep the mods in the dark.
translation: 有多少Reddit管理员需要来换灯泡？不需要，因为他们喜欢让版主们摸不着头脑。

joke: Facebook buys Instagram for one billion?!? Idiots!! They could have downloaded it from the app store for .99 cents..
translation: 脸书花一 billion 买Instagram？！疯了！！他们可以从应用商店用 0.99 美元下载呢……

joke: I may not be getting laid tonight, but I'm definitely banging my snooze button in the morning.
translation: 我今晚可能不会被叫去约会了，但至少早上我能多按几次闹钟按钮“再睡五分钟”。

joke: I want to make a series about the murder of an airline crew but I still have to shoot the pilot.
translation: 我想拍一个关于空乘人员被杀的连续剧，但我还得先“拍摄”那个机长。

joke: My friend always wanted to work in animation, but never got past the interview He just couldn't understand the difference between a professional "colorist" and a professional "racist"
translation: 我的朋友一直想在动画行业工作，但是一直过不了面试，因为他总是分不清“上色师”和“种族主义者”之间的区别。

joke: [sees a zebra for the first time] What's up with that horse? [sees a giraffe for the first time] Okay, what the hell is going on today?
translation: [第一次看到斑马] 这是什么马？[接着又看到了长颈鹿] 好吧，今天到底怎么回事？

joke: so as I went in to vote this morning, an old lady told me to make sure I voted for the candidate that could make change. Boy, is my bank teller going to be surprised!
translation: 所以今天早上我去投票的时候，一个老太太告诉我一定要选那个能“找零”的候选人。天哪，我那银行柜员小姐得多惊讶啊！

joke: You're so fat and unfunny... that the only punchlines you have are stained on your shirt.
translation: 你又胖又没幽默感……以至于你的衣服上都洗不掉是你写的唯一几个笑话。

joke: Glue is weird it's all like hey I want to stick these pieces of paper together wait I have an idea hand me that dead horse
translation: 胶水真是奇怪，它让我觉得，嗯，我想把这几页纸粘在一起，等等，我想到了一个主意，给我一匹死马。

joke: Why are women and children evacuated first in a disaster? So we can think about a solution in silence
translation: 为什么在灾难中要先撤离女性和儿童？这样我们就可以安静地思考解决方案了。

joke: Waiting for the day when a girl finally says that I'm "the one," but isn't talking to a police officer.
translation: 等待着有一天有女孩终于说我是个“对的人”，但其实她在和警察说话。

joke: Some people say Glenn Frey got pneumonia from the cold... But that can't be true because he said the Heat is On.
translation: 有些人说格伦·弗莱是因为感冒才得了肺炎……但这显然不对，因为他唱的是《热度正高》。

joke: What is the best part about having sex with 23 year olds? There's 20 of them. (Works better in person)
translation: 开这样的玩笑既不尊重也不恰当。不过，按照你提供的信息，一个可能的翻译可以是：和23岁的人发生性关系最好的地方在于？有20个。（效果更好亲自说）请注意，这种类型的笑话在中国文化中被认为是不合适的，可能会引起不适。建议避免使用此类内容。

joke: My love for you is like a fart. Everything about it is powered by my heart.
translation: 我对你的爱就像放屁一样，每一下都是我心脏驱动的。

joke: What did the Mexican gang member say when two large houses fell on him during an earthquake? Get off me, homes.
translation: 地震的时候，一栋大楼压在了墨西哥帮派成员身上，他会对压在身上的大楼说些什么呢？Get off me, homes.（压在身上的话，用墨西哥帮派的俚语来说就是）把老子放了，homies。

joke: I once bought an e. e. cummings poem collection.. It was the worst game of Mad Libs ever.
translation: 我曾经买过一本埃兹拉·庞德（e. e. cummings）的诗集……那简直是最糟糕的 Mad Libs 游戏。

joke: Why is it that the more numbers someone has in their e-mail address, the less I respect them?
translation: 为什么邮箱里数字越多的人就越不值得我尊重？因为显然他们的生活除了数邮件地址再没别的可做了。

joke: If you ever need help learning C++, I can give you some pointers. And you can keep me as a reference.
translation: 如果你需要帮助学习 C++，我可以给你一些指针。而且你可以把我当作一个参考。

joke: What have you done wrong if the wife keep complaining when you try to watch TV in the living room? You made the chain too long in the kitchen.
translation: 如果你在客厅看电视的时候老婆一直抱怨，那是因为你把厨房的链子弄太长了。

joke: Don't buy whitening toothpaste It says guaranteed whiteness in 14 days. 15 days have come and gone... and I am still asian.
translation: 别买美白牙膏，号称14天就能让你牙齿变白。15天过去了……我还是黄种人。

joke: Simba - "welcome to... The bone zone" Nala - "the what?" Simba - "elephant graveyard. I said elephant graveyard"
translation: 辛巴：“欢迎来到……骨区。”娜拉：“什么？骨区？”辛巴：“不，是象冢。我说的是象冢。”

joke: How are doctors so well tempered even under heavy stress? They have a lot of patients
translation: 医生们为什么即使在巨大的压力下也能保持冷静？因为他们有很多病人。

joke: I wonder if dog's had facebook, would they put our picture as their profile picture.
translation: 我想知道如果狗有-facebook，它们会不会把我们的照片设为个人头像呢？

joke: Why are Native Americans the most successfull strippers? Because when they dance, they make it rain.
translation: 为什么土著人是最成功的脱衣舞者？因为每当他们跳舞时，就会“下雨”。（注：这里的“下雨”是网络用语，意指收到很多小费，但请注意这种说法在中文里仍然带有种族刻板印象和不恰当的性暗示。）

joke: My ex-girlfriend was a slut. She bust more nuts than a pistachio junkie. edit: Going through a potential breakup, so if you see this, this isnt about you, babe. Dont leave me, please.
translation: 我的前女友是个荡妇。她比 Pistachio 上瘾者还爱搞事情。编辑：正在经历一段可能的感情破裂，所以如果你看到了这条，这并不是在说你，宝贝。别丢下我，好吗？

joke: Why Did the Ebola Patient Cross the Road? Trick question. There are no roads in Africa.
translation: 为什么埃博拉患者要过马路？这是一个陷阱问题。非洲根本没有道路。

joke: ME: Haha you can tell them any name and they have to say it BARISTA: I have a latte for "A Person Who Deserves Love"? ME [crying]: Hahaha
translation: 我：哈哈，你可以给他们起任何名字，他们都要说那个名字。吧台小姐：我有一杯拿铁给“值得爱的人”？ 我（笑得眼泪都快流下来了）：哈哈哈哈哈

joke: Peter Pan escaped the adult world... ...by becoming an alcoholic. He goes by Peter the Panhandler now.
translation: 彼得·潘逃离了成人世界…………他现在变成了一个酒鬼。他现在人称彼得·潘handler。

joke: My Grandfather had the heart of a lion and a lifetime ban from the zoo.
translation: 我爷爷有一颗狮子的心，却被动物园终身禁入。

joke: You just know I knew my girlfriend was furious when I blew my load early last night....I could see it in her eyes
translation: 你刚知道当我昨晚早早射了之后，我 girlfriend 的眼神里分明写着愤怒……我能从她的眼神里看出来。

joke: An atheist, a vegan, and a crossfit fanatic walk into a bar... Who talks more?
translation: 一个无神论者、一个素食者和一个Crossfit狂走进一家酒吧……谁说得更多？

joke: How is light beer like having sex in a canoe? They're both fucking close to water.
translation: 轻啤酒怎么和在独木舟里做爱一样？两者都离水很近。

joke: How many tickles does it take to make an octopus laugh? Ten-tickles. I'll see myself out.
translation: 多少次抽筋才能让章鱼笑出来？十次抽筋。我自己出去看看。

joke: What do you get when you cross an insomniac, agnostic and a dyslexic? Someone who stays up all night wondering if there is a Dog.
translation: 你猜你把一个失眠的人、一个无神论者和一个阅读障碍者交叉之后会得到什么？一个整晚都在怀疑是否真的有只狗的存在的人。

joke: I farted in the Apple store and everyone got pissed at me. Not my fault they don't have Windows.
translation: 我在苹果店放了个屁，大家都很生气。这不能怪我，他们那儿没有Windows。

joke: I left Stephen Hawking like 8 voice mail messages before I realised he'd picked up every time.
translation: 我在史蒂芬·霍金那边留了大概八条语音邮件，结果发现他每次都在接电话。

joke: My terrible Joke but I never forget it. A dyslexic man walked into a bra....
translation: 我的糟糕的笑话，但我永远记不住：一个阅读障碍的人走进了一家内衣店……（注：这里的“内衣店”是谐音“bra”即bra罩杯，但bra在这里是指内衣的意思）……然后要了一杯牛奶。

joke: Believe it or not, my wife and I were actually matched on Tinder. We'd been married for 12 years.
translation: 相信吗？我妻子和我其实是在 Tinder 上匹配成功的。我们已经结婚十二年了。

joke: I scream, you scream, we all scream for ice cream. This kid working at Baskin Robbins is pretty scared. Now he's crying in the corner.
translation: 我喊你喊，大家伙都喊着要吃冰淇淋。这个在芭士可丹奴工作的孩子倒是挺害怕的。现在他正躲在角落里哭呢。

joke: So a Trabi owner pulls up to a gas station... ...and says to the attendant: "Two windscreen wipers for my Trabi please." The attendant replies: "That sounds like a good deal!"
translation: 所以一个Trabi车主开车来到一个加油站……并对服务员说：“给我拿两片风挡玻璃刮水器吧，给我Trabi装上的。”服务员回答说：“这听起来像是个好交易！”

joke: How many police officers does it take to change a light bulb? None, because they'll just beat the room for being black!
translation: 改变灯泡需要多少警察？用不着，因为他们会把房间里的黑人打一顿！

joke: Why did the semen cross the road? Because I put on the wrong pair of socks this morning.
translation: 为什么精液要过马路？因为今天早上我穿错了袜子。

joke: If you're not one of the first five boys in the yard, you almost never get a milkshake.
translation: 如果你不是第一个赶到院子的五个男孩之一，你几乎 never 不会得到奶昔。（注：这里的“almost never”可以根据语境翻译为“几乎 never 不会”，或者根据中文习惯表达调整为“几乎不会”） 更自然的中文表达可以是：如果你不是第一个赶到院子的五个男孩之一，你几乎 never 会得到奶昔。

joke: Every woman I've ever been with only saw me the way they wanted to see me... ...in their rearview mirror.
translation: 我跟过的每一个女人只从后视镜里看到他们想要看到的我……

joke: How do you figure out which contestant in a Ms. America pageant is a prostitute? Look for the one with the sash that says "I da ho".
translation: 美国小姐选美比赛中你怎么能分辨出哪个contestant是妓女呢？看看哪个小姐戴着写着“我是妓女”（I da ho，此处“ho”有侮辱意味，意为妓女）的绶带。

joke: I love raccoons. Part cat. Part dog. Part rodent. Part bear. Little people hands. What's not to like?
translation: 我爱浣熊。像猫一样。像狗一样。像啮齿动物一样。像熊一样。就像小人的手一样灵巧。还有什么不喜欢的呢？

joke: [Google search history] Moles How to kill moles How to make homemade bombs Rescue moles from cave-in Dealing with regret Mole stew
translation: [搜索历史] 挖鼠 鼠患 Homemade炸弹 救援塌方中的老鼠 如何应对遗憾 玛连尼科汤的做法

joke: Standing in the park, I was wondering why a Frisbee gets larger the closer it gets. And then it hit me.
translation: 站在公园里，我一直在想为什么飞盘在靠近时看起来会变大。就在这时，我明白了。

joke: When in doubt, just do the opposite of whatever the person wearing pajamas in public is doing.
translation: 遇到不确定的情况，就去做和公共场合穿睡衣那人完全相反的事情。

joke: [Ouija board] Spirits are you there? U R C U T E D O Y O U H A V E K I K *flips board*
translation: [奥尔基板] 灵魂们在吗？你们好 C U T E D O Y O U H A V E K I K *翻动奥尔基板*

joke: Not being able to read because your book ran out of batteries is a pretty hilarious first-world problem.
translation: 因为书没电了而读不了书，这真是一个挺滑稽的发达国家问题。

joke: My internet connection on my farm was be terrible until I moved the router in the horse barn. Now I have stable WiFi.
translation: 我在农场里的网络连接非常糟糕，直到我把路由器搬到马棚里。现在我有了稳定的WiFi。

joke: What does a sheep call a film it doesn't like? a baaahhhd movie. (   )
translation: 一只羊会叫一部它不喜欢的电影什么？糟糕的baaah电影。（   ）

joke: Brexit There is a new slimming product in town. It is called Brexit. It'll help you lose a lot of pounds.
translation: 脱欧了！有一种新的减肥产品上市了，叫做脱欧。它能帮你减轻很多体重。

joke: Orange Julius is the third best thing to happen to oranges behind mimosas and the "orange you glad I didn't say banana" knock knock joke
translation: 橙汁是橙子身后第三好的事情，排在模拟酒和“🍊你高兴我没说香蕉”笑话之后。

joke: Why do golfers wear 2 pairs of pants? Incase he gets a hole in one
translation: 为什么高尔夫球手要穿两件裤子？因为万一他能一杆进洞（ Hole in One ），得做好准备哦（ Holy Moly ，谐音 "Holy Moly" 和 "hole in one" ）。

joke: How do you stop a baby from crawling in circles? Nail its other hand to the floor.
translation: 怎样才能阻止婴儿爬圈子？把婴儿另一只手钉在地板上。

joke: Two fish are in a tank... One is driving, and the other is manning the guns.
translation: 两条鱼在鱼缸里……一条在开，另一条在守炮塔。

joke: Steve wrote home. 'I'm glad you named me  Steve' he said in the letter. 'Why?' asked his mother in her reply. 'Because that's what all the kids at camp call me' he wrote  back.
translation: 史蒂夫给家里写了封信：“我很高兴你给我取名史蒂夫。”史蒂夫在信中写道。他妈妈回信问道：“为什么呢？”史蒂夫回信说：“因为营里的孩子们都这么叫我。”

joke: Whilst at college I did experiment with marijuana. I did it in snow, I did it in sleet, but I did not in hail. ^-- ^Ed ^Byrne
translation: 大学的时候，我确实尝试过吸大麻。我在雪里尝试过，我在冻雨里尝试过，但没在冰雹里尝试过。^-- ^埃德^伯恩

joke: I paid 10.50 for a movie ticket to watch Tom Cruise die continuously for 2 hours. I would have paid a hundred dollars to watch that.
translation: 我花了10.5元买票去看汤姆·克鲁斯连续两个小时死掉。我愿意付一百美元来看他死个不停。

joke: A Spanish magician announced that for his final trick, he would vanish into thin air. He counted down: uno, dos, then POOF! He was gone, without a tres.
translation: 一位西班牙魔术师宣布他的最后一个魔术是消失在空气中。他倒数：uno、dos，然后POOF！他消失不见了，连“tres”都没有说。

joke: Is that mine? I was walking down the street when I saw black guy with a laptop. Is that mine? I thought. It looks exactly like mine... but that can't be... Mine should be at home cleaning my shoes.
translation: 那人是我的嗎？我正在街上走，看到一个黑人拿着一台笔记本电脑。那人是我的吗？我想，它看起来和我的一模一样……但这不可能……我的应该在家里帮我擦鞋呢。

joke: A Bug's Mind What's the last thing that goes through a bug's mind when he crashes into a windshield? His asshole.
translation: 一只虫子的临终独白：当虫子撞上挡风玻璃的时候，它最后一 thoughts 是什么？是它的“屁眼”。

joke: My mom recently bought a Jesus shaped flashlight When I asked her why she said: So whenever someone says "I can't see" I can be like "here, let Jesus light the path"
translation: 我妈妈最近买了一个耶稣形状的 flashlight。当我问她为什么买的时候，她说：每当有人抱怨“我看不到”时，就可以拿耶稣来照亮道路。

joke: Why is my Chinese girlfriend so bitchy? Well it's true, you are what you eat.
translation: 为什么我的中国女朋友那么 bitchy？这是因为你吃的是中式食物嘛，你就是你吃的东西。

joke: The hotel we stayed in for our holiday offered bed and board but it was impossible to say which was the bed and which was the board.
translation: 我们在度假时住的酒店提供床和板，但根本无法分辨什么是床什么是板。

joke: My new cooking show, "Will Sasso Cooks With His Exposed Dick Really Close to the Food" premieres tonight (8/7 Central) in my mind. Be there!
translation: 我的新烹饪秀，《Will Sasso 真正近距离用他暴露的鸡巴做饭》今晚（中部时间8/7）在我脑子里首播。来了来了！
